item.title: When Plans Change in the Workshop
item.description: Not every project goes smoothly. See how unexpected challenges turn into lessons learned along the way.

media:content.media:title: When Plans Change in the Workshop
media:content.media:description: Not every project goes smoothly. See how unexpected challenges turn into lessons learned along the way.

item.title: Abandoned MIG‑15 Fighter Jet Revival
item.description: This Cold War relic has been sitting for years. The big question: can the MIG‑15 actually start again?

item.title: A Champ, a Cub, and Fabric Work
item.description: Two classic planes — a Champ and a Cub — get attention as fabric restoration brings them back to life.

item.title: Fate of 6 Abandoned Airplanes
item.description: Six aircraft projects were left unfinished and forgotten. See what ultimately happened to these abandoned planes.

item.title: The Emotional Support Screw
item.description: A single screw is added for reassurance during a project. Sometimes it’s the little things that make the difference.

item.title: Elvis’s Jet Gets a New Home
item.description: Elvis Presley’s private jet has been relocated, giving fans a new place to see this piece of music history. Where would you visit it?

item.title: P‑51 Mustang Engine Revival
item.description: A homemade P‑51 Mustang roars back to life after years of silence. See the careful steps taken to bring this classic warbird’s engine to its first start. Would you restore one?

item.title: Cherokee Inspection by Expert
item.description: Follow a seasoned Piper specialist as they carefully inspect an abandoned Cherokee airplane. From checking the airframe to evaluating the engine’s state, the assessment reveals what it takes to bring a neglected aircraft back into safe flying condition.

item.title: Engine Revival After Years
item.description: Witness the remarkable comeback of a homemade P‑51 Mustang as its engine fires up for the first time in years.

item.title: Abandoned MiG-15 soars after 12 years
item.description: After more than a decade of sitting idle, a legendary MiG-15 jet is brought back to life. How did this historic aircraft overcome years of neglect to fly again?

item.title: Quest for flight: can an abandoned plane fly again?
item.description: A long-forgotten aircraft gets a second chance as restoration efforts push against time, corrosion, and doubt. What will it take to see this plane back in the sky?

item.title: Stuck 421 propeller challenge
item.description: Dealing with a 421 aircraft propeller that won’t budge, focusing on troubleshooting, safety, and careful handling. How do mechanics free a stubborn prop safely?

item.title: Abandoned Cessna 411 heaven for airplane enthusiasts
item.description: Exploring a long-forgotten Cessna 411, a rare find that excites any aviation fan. What makes this abandoned plane such a unique discovery?

item.title: Car with a non-functional defroster switch
item.description: A closer look at a car whose defroster switch doesn’t actually work, highlighting quirky design choices and the importance of checking vehicle functions. Why do some controls exist only for show?

item.title: An experiment that sounds questionable already
item.description: Mixing a boat motor, airplane wings, and a plastic chair leads to an unexpected and risky experiment. How far can curiosity really go before things get interesting?

item.title: A plane with a past unlike any other
item.description: Digging into the history of an aircraft whose past missions and design set it apart from the rest. How does history shape an airplane’s legacy?

item.title: The story behind “Douglas Wrong-Way”
item.description: Exploring how Douglas earned the unforgettable nickname “Wrong-Way” and the aviation history behind it. What moment defined his legacy?

item.title: Affordable private jets you can actually buy
item.description: A countdown of budget-friendly private jets starting around $75,000, highlighting performance, ownership costs, and surprises along the way. Which one offers the best value?

item.title: Inside the TS21: speed brakes and airflow secrets
item.description: Breaking down the TS21’s speed brakes and intake exhaust design to reveal how performance and control come together. What makes this system so unique?

item.title: Crafting a paddle: sanding, soldering, and hidden details
item.description: A behind-the-scenes look at paddle construction, combining hands-on sanding, precise soldering, and lesser-known details that make all the difference. What secrets lie in the process?
